courses.name: Learn SwiftUI
courses.description: SwiftUI is a user interface framework for building user interfaces for iOS, iPadOS, watchOS, tvOS, visionOS and macOS, developed by Apple Inc. for the Swift programming language.

courses.name: UI/UX Research
courses.description: Discover the foundational principles of UI/UX research by learning how to identify and understand user needs. This lesson will explore various user research methods such as interviews, surveys, and user personas. We will delve into how to analyze user feedback to uncover pain points and desires that drive design decisions.

lessons.title: What is state management in swiftUI

courses.name: Environmental Studies
courses.description: You will understand how to achieve economic, social, and environmental sustainability, use strategic frameworks for sustainable practices, engage in sustainability reporting, and consider stakeholder interests.

courses.name: Relationship
courses.description: You will understand the intricacies of interpersonal dynamics in this engaging lesson that breaks down the various stages of relationship development. We'll examine key theories of relationship formation, maintenance, and dissolution, providing insights into how relationships evolve over time.

courses.name: Photography
courses.description: You will understand the intricacies of interpersonal dynamics in this engaging lesson that breaks down the various stages of relationship development. We'll examine key theories of relationship formation, maintenance, and dissolution, providing insights into how relationships evolve over time.

lessons.title: The Art of Composition in Photography
